Text.Page:
Ghabar's map indicates the pylons are coming out of Raseri Festning—that's the giants' stronghold in this area. Giant and argon technology would be a dangerous combination. Too dangerous to leave be.

Your orders are to infiltrate Raseri Festning and destroy all the pylons!

The Vale of Spires is much safer thanks to your hard work. The federation—we—owe you a great debt!

Report back to Habere and let them know what we've managed here. They need to know it's time to mobilize our forces.

If Thulsa doesn't have a hold over the vale, that means we can start bringing our troops in. He's running out of enemies to hide behind!

Thulsa's reign of terror is coming to an end, in large part thanks to you!
